website_summaries.verdict: Despite its price, this set is sturdy and the net is durable.
pros: An inexpensive set that includes a needle pump for its three balls
Many customers noted that its construction is sturdier than Spikeball sets

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game but have had issues in the past with other brands breaking quickly so I decided to try Striker. Great find! The net on Striker seems to be a little thicker and a lot more durable. The other bonus is the needle and pump it comes with...(pump even has a little spot to store the needle so it doesn't break) Overall great buy...glad I came across this version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough quality for elementary age
customer_reviews.text: Just spend the extra and buy Spikeball. Frame bends easily for the tension needed for upper grade students and adults. Balls are not as nice as Spikeball, either. But it's still fun in a goofy way. We ended up shelling out for Spikeball, and threw Strikeball away. Adult, 14 yr old girl, 10 yr old girl
customer_reviews.author: Brian Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Great summer toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids are hard to buy for because they have everything I saw this and thought they might like it and they did they loved playing with this in the backyard with their cousins and friends
customer_reviews.author: Emilia

customer_reviews.title: my grandkids didn't think it was that much fun. I did see others on the beach with ...
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to connect the net, my grandkids didn't think it was that much fun. I did see others on the beach with it and they were having a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Deni Lori

customer_reviews.title: A definite recommendation!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a few uses now and it works great! I never played enough on the original strike ball game to compare but the net seems to be durable, comes with 3 balls and look that the pump is included! I definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M.

customer_reviews.title: Ugggg....disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a quality product....broke 1st use. Net is too small to fit. Frame broke when trying to stretch the net to fit circle. Not worth the $50+ that I paid for it. Disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bybee

customer_reviews.title: Brotastic Broxperience
customer_reviews.text: Insanely fun game to bro out with your bros. Set up is pretty easy, i couldnt find the needle for the pump because I am an idiot but we eventually figured that its contained on the top of the pump in a nice little latch. Come with 3 balls in case your bros are spiking so hard and you lose a few. Definitely recommend and will be using this on the playa all summer, player!
customer_reviews.author: Darius Amiri

customer_reviews.title: A little cheap but the 8 year old it loving it
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get the net on even with the instruction. But once we got it together my 8 year old nephew loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel's mom

customer_reviews.title: The net is a little small, compared tot he ...
customer_reviews.text: The net is a little small, compared tot he name brand. It took a lot of effort to get it on, and there was a little damage done to the structure as we man-handled it to get the net on.
customer_reviews.author: lutheranfictionfan

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase! We brought it to the beach and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! We brought it to the beach and adults and kids played this game a ton. It comes with a bag so it's easy to pack it all up and carry it. Much cheaper than other brands and it was a ton of fun!! I would recommend it:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this game! Got this set for my son for Christmas and set it up that day. Everything went together well, but you probably don't want to put it together and take it apart every time you play. The net needs to be tight, which requires some effort.
customer_reviews.author: swampajean

customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, easy to assemble, fun all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Zuze

customer_reviews.title: Legs don't flatten if you land on it. So ...
customer_reviews.text: Legs don't flatten if you land on it. So when you go to dive for the ball and land on it, that's the last time you will play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Randles

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! The net fits, but it is too loose, the balls do not bounce off it like the video or images imply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... 14 year old son and 11 year old daughter love this game
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son and 11 year old daughter love this game. Works well in our basement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.text: The net was very hard to put on and if you make the net tight the sides come apart. You cannot get the net tight enough to bounce the balls. Do not like this product. Very disappointed and will be returning product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan A. Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Game is so much fun to play. Best game for the summer time
customer_reviews.author: David Martsch

customer_reviews.title: Great game - fun for all ages from grand parents ...
customer_reviews.text: Great game - fun for all ages from grand parents to grand kids. Net is hard to put on but when it's on good it stays.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - the overall quality is not comparable with the original
customer_reviews.text: It works, yes. However, to mount the net is a pain in the rear. I used the original and it is way better. The tension of the net gets lost as well after the second use, hence I say it is a quality issue. Lesson learned, you get what you pay for. Will I buy it again, no. Would I recommend it, no. It is just not worth it. The pump, the cheapest pump I could imagine. Doesn't feel stable at all. The balls, they hold the air, but one has black print marks all over it. This brings me to my statement in my first paragraph, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Volker Schweyer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke easily - contacted company to see about ordering a replacement part and no reply - frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce P.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game but the net is very tough to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun game but the net is very tough to get on. If it had been easier I would have given this 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: owenb_

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Each bar is supposed to have 5 clips. One of the bars was missing the clips completely.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Maddox

customer_reviews.title: They love it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a family gift for our beach loving friends. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: Great Game. It was easy to set up and start playing. The package arrived quickly and with no damage. I bought for my nephew who loves to play this game with all of his friends!
customer_reviews.author: kerie  crawford

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: received it, daughter very excited to play it, but hasn't yet with the snow
customer_reviews.author: Geri VanDusen

customer_reviews.title: Happy Campers
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren are very happy with this they are both very into volleyball. It's fun and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: but I think it will be perfect and exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: We have not used tis yet because it was purchased to take to the beach with my grandchildren, but I think it will be perfect and exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Jane and Bruce Kyburz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift to my son. He reported problems assembling it and having it stay together.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same as spikeball. the balls are much bigger, and it is harder to put together. Not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to string evenly but worked it out.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: can not get the net to stay on and if you it with the ball the net falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley O.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight plastic
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality construction with plastic rim that they warn you could warp if left in a warm car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality all around - especially for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Balls were very poorly made. They would not hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things about this Striker set
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this Striker set! Tried it out as a more affordable alternative to Spikeball and I'm so glad that I did. I watched the tutorial video online for the assembly, and once I realized that you just have to start attaching the net at four opposite points, it was really easy to get on. We brought it to the beach the other day and it works great in the sand, and is super convenient to transport in the included carrying bag. Really appreciated that it came with three balls as well. I can't believe how much of a bargain this is compared to other similar sets. I would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: It really does feel more solid than the official spikeball unit! Comes with more balls than the official unit too. The legs do not fold, and stay upright and sturdy during play. Has held up great, and look forward to continue using it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Nisly

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play for all ages! Easy set up and break down. Two thumbs up :)
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I bough this for my son. He plays a few times a week with friends in the backyard and everyone seems to have fun. They are into it. I am giving it 5 stars because it was delivered so fast.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite beach game- by far
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite beach game- by far. After playing Striker- it blows Spikeball out of the water. Overall better quality product, comes with 3 balls and the carry bag is large enough to fit your phone/wallet/beach towel so you don't need a beach bag. Still can't believe how inexpensive this game is in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forget Spikeball...Buy this instead!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, great price, unreal cardio. Perfect game for the beach or backyard. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: joshua garland

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My boys are tennis players. They love playing Striker Ball.. Good for focus and reaction time and just good plain fun. Tracy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Netting is very loose so that the ball doesn't bounce. I wouldn't not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Striker Beach Volleyball Spike Game | Includes Ball (3) Net & Pump & Carry Bag | Exciting Fast Paced Outdoor Lawn Games | Perfect for Backyard, Beach, Tailgate | Fun for Kids Adults Family
feature_bullets: FAST PACED GAME FOR ALL AGES: Striker is an Indoor Outdoor 2 vs 2 beach volleyball style game that’s great for the whole family! It is becoming a sport in and of itself!
LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE: Spike, slam, or strike at the beach, BBQ, backyard party, tailgating, concerts, sporting events, camping, and just about anywhere else a good time can be had!

COMPETITIVE OR RELAXED GAMEPLAY: With 100% net coverage, enjoy the flexibility to tighten or loosen the netting to achieve the style of play you're seeking. Perfect cross-training game for soccer, beach volleyball, and more!

TURN ANYWHERE INTO YOUR STRIKER COURT: Minimal space needed for game play whether it’s on sand, grass, gravel, pavement, volcanic rock, or the moon! Great lawn game alternative to cornhole, bag toss, frisbee, or horseshoes.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
